document_data.mainbody:
Mardivec Gentlecut was an incubus servant of Grazzt in the Moonsea in the late 15 century DR.
Mardivec was an old friend of the goblin cambion Agrak. He always had with him his dretch servant Noisome.
Circa 1486 DR, Mardivec was forcibly summoned to Faer√ªn from Azzagrat, together with his master the demon lord Grazzt. He and Noisome decided to join Lord Agrak. He resided inside the prison of the Skullspike tribe, enjoying the madness spreading among the goblins.
Mardivec liked his devilish form, unlike his fellows.
